text: @JoeBiden Stop talking about Trump and instead focus on the blue base, selecting a woman VP (hint) maybe Susan Rice. She the most qualified. Minimize COVID-19 conversation. The public is tied of everyone telling us about it. We all want hear what you will do for your base and the plan.
